headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin that exposes a fake dimmer with incremental buttons.
footerDisplay: Each dimmer can have many values. The values will be sorted through from first to last when increasing, and last to first when decreasing.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the dimmer, that is initially used as the display name.

values.title: List of values to shift through
values.description: These are the values that the buttons will shift through.

items.title: Value
items.description: A value between 0 and 100 to represent the next dimmer value.

sceneValues.title: List of values to set as scenes
sceneValues.description: These are the values that the scene activators will use.

items.title: Value
items.description: A value between 0 and 100 to represent the scene values.
